data.actual_result: It closes the profile pop-up and the game info pop-up at the same time
data.expected_result: It should close only the profile pop-up
data.short_description: Clicking outside of a profile pop-up inside the Quick Launcher games info, closes all the pop-ups
data.steps_to_repro: - Click in the icon of the game in the Quick Launcher - Click in a friend's photo that played (or is playing) the game - Click outside the profile pop-up
